entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
